title: Side Impl
source:
[[div_ class="side-block {$new} {$random}"]]

[[/div]]

[[[tags|Поиск по тегам]]]

[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="side-block sns {$corner} {$new}"]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="heading {$head}"]]
Объекты по категориям
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="menu-item small menu-article-list"]]

[[div class="side-block sns {$corner} {$new}"]]

[[div class="heading {$head} {$sandbox}"]]
Полигон

[[div_ class="menu-item sub-item"]]

[[/module]]

[[/div]]


[[div id="u-side-footer" class="side-block {$new}"]]

++++++ [[[system:page-tags | Список доступных тегов]]]

[[div style="font-size:70%;color:#888;margin-top:7px"]]
© SCP Foundation Russia

Возрастное ограничение: **18+**

Авторство: [[[licensing |объекты]]], [[[licensing-ru|ru-объекты]]], [[[wl:the-archives|рассказы Библиотеки]]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[a href="##" class="close-menu"]]
[[image black.png style="z-index:-1; opacity: 0.3;"]]
[[/a]]
[[ifexpr "%%this|category%%" == "sandbox"]]
  [[module InterWiki article="%%this|name%%" prependline="-----\n[[div class=\"side-block sns {$corner} {$new}\"]][[div class=\"heading {$head} {$sandbox}\"]]На других языках[[/div]]" appendline="[[/div]]" omitlanguage="ru" language="ru" order="language_native"]]
  [[div_ class="menu-item"]]
  [[image nav:side/default.png]][[a href="%%url%%" target="_blank" title="%%language%%"]]%%language_native%%[[/a]]
  [[/div]]
  [[/module]]
[[else]]
  [[module InterWiki article="%%this|fullname%%" prependline="-----\n[[div class=\"side-block sns {$corner} {$new}\"]][[div class=\"heading {$head} {$sandbox}\"]]На других языках[[/div]]" appendline="[[/div]]" omitlanguage="ru" language="ru" order="language_native"]]
  [[div_ class="menu-item"]]
  [[image nav:side/default.png]][[a href="%%url%%" target="_blank" title="%%language%%"]]%%language_native%%[[/a]]
  [[/div]]
  [[/module]]
[[/ifexpr]]
